page.title: 08WHY MRS ORR BOUGHT HER HOUSE
page.content: Mrs Orr went to live in{Bamburgh } {Avenue in 1956.}The house was brand new and cost Â£1,450.The mortgage rate was fixed at 5.5% and cost Â£8.50 a month.It is a semi detached with a garden.She moved there because the house was one of the new houses being built in South Shields at that time.The{Leas and beach}are just over the road.It is only a five minute walk to the nearby shops and a short bus ride to the town or Sunderland.These were all good reasons for buying a house here.The old N.C.B.railway has gone and more new houses have been built. Today the houses sell for around{Â£32,000.}She and her family enjoy living there but Mrs Orr would like to see better control of dogs and motor bikes.
